title: Best Chain Reaction Easter deals | Cut-price Castelli and Endura clothing, Vitus and Nukeproof bikes, and more
content:
We’ve scoured the Chain Reaction Easter sale to bring you the best road and mountain bike bargains going.

From reduced high-spec bikes to deals on finishing kit and component upgrades, there’s something for every rider.

Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bib Tights £140 £61

Chain Reaction

We know how popular Castelli clothing can be with road riders, so the Easter sale is a good time to grab a bargain.

These Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bib Tights are available with a 56 per cent saving.

Latest deals

Endura MT500 Waterproof MTB Jacket II £239.99 from £96

Chain Reaction

With an extra-long hem and over-helmet hood, this is one of the best waterproof jackets for mountain biking we’ve tested.

You can save up to an impressive 60 per cent at Chain Reaction right now.

Latest deals

LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set £39.99 £32.99

Chain Reaction

The LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set is an entry-level mechanical torque wrench at a reasonable price.

It covers a 2-24Nm range and includes 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10mm hex heads, as well as T25 and T30 Torx heads.

Latest deals

LifeLine Performance Big Dial Track Pump £29.99 £17.99

The Big Dial Track Pump from LifeLine performance has a maximum pressure of 160psi, with a steel base that aims to provide some added stability.

It features a large pressure gauge and is available right now with a saving of 40 per cent.

Latest deals

Northwave Raptor Arctic GTX Winter Shoes £209.99 £109.99

Chain Reaction

You can’t put a price on warm feet in wet conditions.

The Northwave Raptor Arctic GTX Winter Shoes are an excellent choice for keeping your feet comfortable when it gets cold and wet, with a Gore-Tex membrane providing all-weather protection.

Better still, they’re reduced by nearly 50 per cent.

Latest deals

Endura Hummvee Trouser II £64.99 from £46

Chain Reaction

Endura’s Hummvee Trouser II gives you top protection against wind and rain.

The DWR nylon mini-ripstop fabric makes these trousers an ideal choice when you’re mountain biking or cycling to work in unreliable conditions.

Latest deals

Mobi V-15 Portable Bike Pressure Washer £99.99 £84.99

Chain Reaction

Mobi’s V-15 portable pressure washer looks versatile and is available with a modest saving.

What’s more, at only 5kg for a 15-litre capacity, it’s lighter and more compact than most of its rivals.

Latest deals

Castelli Alpha ROS 2 Light Jacket £320 from £110

 

The Castelli Alpha ROS 2 Light Jacket is a versatile piece of kit.

This third-generation design offers a combination of warmth, breathability and water resistance, suitable for the fresher days of spring.

We reviewed this jacket last year and awarded it five stars.

Latest deals

Garmin Edge 1030 Plus £519.99 £349.99

Jack Luke / Immediate Media

Wherever you’re riding, the Garmin Edge 1030 Plus will keep you on track.

This is a feature-rich GPS bike computer with full turn-by-turn navigation, as well as enough training and performance metrics to satisfy even the most data-hungry cyclist.

While the 1030 has been superseded by the Garmin Edge 1040, that means you can get it at a bargain price for what has been one of the best bike computers of the past couple of years.

Latest deals

Brand-X Ascend II dropper seatpost £139.99 from £49.99

Andy McCandlish / Immediate Media

Quite simply, the Brand-X Ascend II is one of the best dropper posts you can buy – it offers excellent performance for a bargain price. 

The Ascend II proves reliability and quality performance needn’t come with a hefty price tag and, with three diameters, four lengths and four sizes to choose from, there’s a wide range of options for almost every bike.

It’s available from Chain Reaction at a remarkable 64 per cent off.

Latest deals

Brand-X DH1 Full Face MTB Cycling Helmet £59.99 £29.00

Brand-X’s full-face helmet is designed for downhill riding.

It features 10 air vents, designed to keep you cool without compromising on protection.

Latest deals

Vitus Nucleus 27 VRS dropper and pedals bundle £974.97 £599.99

Chain Reaction Cycles

This bundle package takes the Vitus Nucleus 27 VRS hardtail and aims to make it even more capable (and better value), with the addition of a dropper post and pedals.

You get the Brand-X Ascend dropper post with internal cable routing and a 1x remote, fitted to the bike so it’s ready to go, as well as Nukeproof’s Neutron EVO flat pedals.

Latest deals

Shimano 105 R7000 11-speed rim brake groupset £599.99 £299.99

Simon Bromley / Immediate Media

Who said rim brakes are dead?

If you’re still running rim brakes, there’s good news – there are plenty of bargains out there, whether you’re upgrading your current bike or putting together a cut-price build project.

Shimano’s 105 R7000 11-speed groupset continues to offer slick-shifting, smart looks and braking that, dare we say it, still works just fine.

Latest deals

Nukeproof Scout 275 Elite £2,499 £1,749.99

Chain Reaction Cycles

Released in May 2022, the Nukeproof Scout offers revised geometry and improved sizing options.

The geometry follows the trend for lower, slacker and longer numbers, which should make the Scout more capable on technical trails, while the new tube profiles are claimed to optimise ride characteristics.

This model has a 140mm-travel Fox Float Rhythm fork, Shimano SLX 1×12-speed groupset and 27.5in DT Swiss M1900 Spline wheels wrapped in Schwalbe Magic Mary and Hans Dampf tyres.

Latest deals

Five Ten Freerider Pro MTB shoes £130 from £65

Mick Kirkman / Immediate Media

Rated an elusive five stars in our best mountain bike shoes round-up, Five Ten’s Freerider Pro mountain biking shoes are a real classic.

With savings of up to 50 per cent, what’s stopping you from upgrading to some new kicks?

Latest deals

dhb Dorica MTB Shoe £85.00 £40.00

These cycling shoes feature a nylon sole, aiming to provide pedalling efficiency and comfort for long rides.

There’s an elastic lace retainer to keep everything tidy, plus perforated holes for a touch of added breathability in warmer weather.

Nukeproof Horizon Pro Downhill flat pedals £99.99 from £44.99

Nukeproof has a solid reputation for producing high-quality flat mountain biking pedals at a reasonable price, and the Nukeproof Horizon Pro Downhill flat pedals are no exception.

Their generous size, exceptional grip and decent weight earned them four and a half stars in our in-depth review.

Latest deals

dhb Aeron Bib Shorts 2.0 SS22 £80 £40

David Caudery / Immediate Media

Fancy saving 50 per cent off some new bib shorts? Look no further than the dhb Aeron Bib Shorts 2.0 from the 2022 spring/summer collection.

There are no fewer than seven colourways on offer at this great price, including classy khaki, navy and burgundy options.

Latest deals

Endura Hummvee II Shorts with Liner £64.99 £32

Chain Reaction Cycles

You’ll be spoilt for choice with the six colourways on offer through this deal on Endura Hummvee Shorts.

Whatever your taste, the Hummvee II Shorts from Endura are a great deal with a chunky 51 per cent off.

Latest deals

Vitus Sommet 297 AMP Mountain Bike £4,599.99 £3,679.99

Chain Reaction Cycles

Featuring a mullet wheel setup, 170mm travel front and rear and SRAM’s X01 Eagle groupset, this is another long-travel enduro machine with some really tasty build features.

The Sommet 297 is also kitted out with quality Maxxis Assegai and DHR II tyres and features a RockShox Reverb Stealth dropper seatpost.

Latest deals

DMR V11 Flat Mountain Bike Pedals Exclusive £55 £29.99

Alex Evans / Immediate Media

We liked the DMR V11 Pedals for their large, stable platform, sharp pins for grip, and extra-durable nylon body.

We liked them so much in fact, we gave them an excellent four and a half stars in our review.

It’s fitting that, given our only notable criticism was the price, they can now be purchased at a discount of nearly 50 per cent.

Latest deals

Nukeproof Giga 290 Comp Carbon Bike £3699.99 £2,399.99

Nukeproof’s Giga, released in 2021, is the brand’s longest-travel trail bike. It’s available right now with a 35 per cent saving.

It features a RockShock Domain suspension fork and a Super Deluxe Select rear shock, designed for steep descents and technical climbs.

You can read our first impressions of the Nukeproof Giga 290 Comp Carbon Bike here.

Latest deals

 

Save money on a new MTB helmet

Need some inspiration for your new mountain bike helmet? Here’s a small selection of some of the MTB helmets on offer at reduced prices.

Bell Super DH MIPS helmet £319.99 £212

Chain Reaction Cycles

This full-face, downhill-certified mountain bike helmet features a nifty tool-free removable chin bar.

The Bell Super DH, which scored a near-perfect four and a half stars on test, is also kitted out with MIPS and an easy-to-secure Fidlock buckle.

For those who love to capture the action, there’s also a neat breakaway camera mount.

Latest deals

POC Tectal Race SPIN Helmet £200 from £70

Chain Reaction

The POC Tectal Race SPIN is designed to offer lightweight protection for riders who like to shred with speed.

The lid features POC’s SPIN technology – the brand’s answer to MIPS – and is available in four colours.

Latest deals

Fox Speedframe Pro MTB Helmet (MIPS) £164.99 from £63

Andy McCandlish

Fox is a popular brand for clothing, helmets and other safety equipment among mountain bikers.

We found the Fox Racing Speedframe Pro helmet comfortable on test, with great venting and all-important good looks.

Latest deals
author: Fin Cousins
